thread.title: It's the end of an era: Coronation Street's classic set will be demolished - Coronation Street Soaps -
thread.title_full: It's the end of an era: Coronation Street's classic set will be demolished - Coronation Street News - Soaps - Digital Spy

author: Justin Harp
title: It's the end of an era: Coronation Street's classic set will be demolished - Coronation Street Soaps -
text: Plans to knock down Coronation Street's classic set in Manchester are moving ahead – in spite of a preservation campaign.Manchester's planning committee have given the green light to the first phase of developers Allied London's bid to renovate the area where several Corrie landmarks currently stand. © Digital Spy Historic sites like the Rovers Return Inn and the old Granada House will soon be torn down in favour of the St John's multi-million pound development, which will include 2,500 apartments, a hotel, an office high rise and entertainment facilities.Tours of the classic Coronation Street set are currently still taking place through December 31, but this redevelopment project could begin as early as next autumn.There had been a huge campaign from the public to save the set at the former Granada Studios in Manchester, but it does not seem to have swayed the local planning committee. © ITVCurrent set at MediaCityUK Earlier this year, it was suggested that parts of the set, like the Rovers Return, could be preserved and incorporated into the new development.An ITV spokesperson previously explained: "The tour at Quay Street was always for a limited time as Coronation Street's new home is now at MediaCityUK. "The Coronation Street lot will be removed in early 2016 when the site will be returned to Allied London for future development."Coronation Street filmed at the old Granada Studios from 1982 until January 2014.Digital Spy Soap Scoop video - hit play below for gossip on more Gloved Hand Killer deaths in Hollyoaks, the reveal of Robert Sugden's shooter in Emmerdale, a drastic decision from Kathy Beale in EastEnders and Alya Nazir's guilt spiralling out of control in Coronation Street. function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID); modVP = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.VIDEO_PLAYER); modExp = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.EXPERIENCE); modCon = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.CONTENT); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.BEGIN, onVideoStart); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.STOP, onVideoStop); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.PROGRESS, onVideoProgress); } #_containermyExperience4551550723001 { height: 100%; } // InSkin integration parameters: InSkinParams['myInSkin14551550723001'] = { 'srv_SectionID': '', 'srv_SectionIDPlay': '123757', 'srv_Keywords': '', 'plr_ContentID': 'myExperience4551550723001', 'plr_ContentType': 'BRIGHTCOVE3', 'plr_ContentW': 558, 'plr_ContentH': 314, 'plr_NoSkinContentResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinContentW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinContentH': 348, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinH': 348, 'plr_ResizeOnHideSkin': true, 'plr_HideSkinOnExternalAd': 'all', 'plr_ShowSkinAfterExternalAd': true, 'cnt_SmartPlayer': true }; // create the InSkin object: var InSkinObject4551550723001 = new InSkin.Base('myInSkin14551550723001'); brightcove.createExperiences(); if (!navigator.userAgent.match(/Android/i)) { InSkinObject4551550723001.init(); ai_type="video"; } Get the Inside Soap magazine on your iPhone or iPad
